plot: Short propaganda film produced during the summer of 1939, just before the outbreak of the Second World War, to urge Britain's able-bodied men to enlist.
title: Happy Families
plot_es: Short propaganda film produced during the summer of 1939, just before the outbreak of the Second World War, to urge Britain's able-bodied men to enlist.
